description:
Submission of details pursuant to conditions 2 ( 3 x units at wheelchair standards), 3 (53 x units at Lifetime Home standards),4 (landscaping) 6 (Protection of trees) and 9 (facing materials) of planning permission dated 5th February 2001 (ref: P002005) for the erection of Phase 1 of Naish Court redevelopment (42 flats and 36 maisonettes in blocks on Bemerton Street frontage and 8 houses on land north of 197-208 Naish Court). 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  L(90)101A, 102A, 2225/11301P2,                         11302P2, L(00)30/0, 31/L, 32/J, 34/                         N, 36/K, 38/G, 46/1, 47/E, 48/D, 49/                         E, 50/K, 51/H, 52/H, 53/D, L(74)01/                         A, 02/A, 03/A, 04/A, 05/B, 06/A, 07/                         A, 08/A AND 09/A.
